Table 1:Weaknessfor different GRPO variants. Refer toSec.2.2for details.

Figure 2:Architecture illustration of MAPO. We reveal that the trajectory certainty varies across samples. In general, we introduce the Advantage Percent Deviation to replace the advantage function for high-certainty elements. We utilize the Trajectory Certainty Reweight to dynamically reweight the advantage function via trajectory certainty. Assume rollout numberG=4G\!=\!4. Best viewed in color. Zoom in for details. SeeSec.3.2.
